Name: Cowroid with throne name of king Tuthmosis III
Description: Steatite cowroid, a shell-shaped amulet with flat base incised with a motif. This example bears the throne name of Tuthmosis III in a cartouche between two indistinct symmetrical designs. The throne name of Tuthmosis III was Menkheperra; it continued to be used for at least eight hundred years after his death on scarab amulets.
